title: Comp - conveniunt subito - Contentio ver hiems

content.description:
Conveniuntconvenio, -ire: to come together subito cuncti de montibus altis 
pastorespastor, -is, m: shepherd pecudumpecus, -oris, n: flock vernalivernalis, -is, -e, adj.: springtime luce sub umbra 
arboreaarboreus, -a, -um, adj.: of a tree pariter laetas celebrare CamenasCamenae, -arum, f. pl.: the Muses (goddesses of the arts, literature, and science).
content.question: In which of the following ways do the shepherds celebrate the Muses?

choices.label: They dedicate one of their sheep to the Underworld.
They gather their flocks at the foot of the mountain.
They plant shady trees for the new season.
They gather together in the springtime.

content.answer: They gather together in the springtime.
